items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dressed
items.body: This was the cutest, comfiest dress Iâ€™ve ever worn. Bought it for a friendâ€™s wedding and itâ€™s simple enough that it can be worn for any kind of occasion! Fit was a little loose but very comfortable, definitely worth the price and not expensive at all. Read more
items.author: Dina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful fit, sleeves shorter than expected.
items.body: Looks beautiful on. Sleeves in the photos on the models look full length but were on 3/4 length on me and I have shorter arms. Luckily I do not mind the 3/4 length sleeves. Just not exactly as advertised Read more
items.author: Spice

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and comfortable
items.body: This dress is exactly as pictured, the color is spot on! It fits true to size and is very comfortable to wear. Iâ€™m really happy with it and would definitely recommend. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute on the model, didnt work for me
items.body: Loved the color, but as a broad shoulder big chested woman this dress didn't compliment my figure. I couldnt go a size up because my bottom half was already being swallowed by the dress. The chest area was tight and the fabric wouldn't lay right to create the image modeled. Read more
items.author: Mariano hernandez Jr

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
